Attention: Most Linux distributions assuming that they are operating on commodity hardware; therefore, the default Ethernet MTU of 1500 is the typical default value. Do not use the default MTU of 1500 with Linux on IBM Z or LinuxONE; instead, use the guidance that is provided in this chapter. Chapter 2.
